seed_pair.known: 在过去一切都容易得多。
seed_pair.target: It was all much easier in the past.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 是的，他们会很高兴帮忙。
recent_seed_pairs.target: Yes they'll be happy to help.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 他们说他们差不多准备好了。
recent_seed_pairs.target: They said that they were almost ready.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 不，他们必须自己赶火车。
recent_seed_pairs.target: No they have to catch the train themselves.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 他们说了他们想做什么。
recent_seed_pairs.target: They said what they wanted to do.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 他们没有说他们想做什么。
recent_seed_pairs.target: They didn't say what they wanted to do.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 他们说了他们昨晚看到谁了吗？
recent_seed_pairs.target: Did they say who they saw last night?

recent_seed_pairs.known: 我们的朋友大约六点钟来了。
recent_seed_pairs.target: Our friends came round at about six o'clock.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 我们不得不离开，因为孩子们累了。
recent_seed_pairs.target: We had to leave because the children were tired.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 他可能在那里，但不太可能。
recent_seed_pairs.target: He might be there but it's not very likely.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 问题的一部分是不同地区的数量。
recent_seed_pairs.target: Part of the problem is the number of different areas.
